https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3RFBS3Zo7WUQ6X7zdZwOZdGYHSk.jpg Two best friends and neighbors get a chance to work abroad, but one of them has to stay to take care of their parents. So Ossama stays and Gad flies. Five years later, Gad returns in a short vacation, but finds Ossama trying to prevent him from leaving again, through a series of comic and peculiar situations. A Friend Indeed
